Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A3-6410
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R5 mobile.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most should work, if using machine pre-2014, use demo to check
  • Additional Notes: It will probably work on machines pre-2014 and probably on windows 7, try the demo to ensure it works on your machine.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Anything past AMD A3-6410 mobile, so past 2014 should be good.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything past a mobile Radeon R5 is more than enough.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Again try the demo, it should work with most.
  • Additional Notes: Try the demo, game is rather arcadey, it will not be to everyones taste.
